description.label: Description
description.value: The oars are splintered, and rowers take one hit for +5 Damage from flying splinters. Until the oars are replaced, the boat can only drift. Optionally, an oar Critical Hit only destroys one oar, according to the direction from which the attack came. Given a couple of turns to improvise a mount — a Difficult (–10) Trade (Boatbuilding or Carpentry) Test — the surviving oar can be fixed to the rear of the boat and used to stern-scull at half the normal speed. Steering while stern-sculling requires a successful Challenging (+0) Boat Handling Test.
